A '''mossy cobblestone wall''' is a [[mossy cobblestone]] variant of a [[wall]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Mossy cobblestone walls can be mined using any [[pickaxe]]. If mined without a pickaxe, they drop nothing.

{{Breaking row|Mossy Cobblestone Wall|Pickaxe|Wood|horizontal=1}}

=== Natural generation ===
Mossy cobblestone walls may generate in [[pillager outpost]]s.

=== Crafting ===
{{Crafting
|A2=Mossy Cobblestone
|B2=Mossy Cobblestone
|C2=Mossy Cobblestone
|A3=Mossy Cobblestone
|B3=Mossy Cobblestone
|C3=Mossy Cobblestone
|Output=Mossy Cobblestone Wall,6
|type= Decoration block
}}

=== Stonecutting ===
{{Stonecutting
| Mossy Cobblestone
| Mossy Cobblestone Wall
}}

== Usage ==
{{for|information about the placement mechanics of all walls|Wall#Usage}}

=== Note blocks ===
Mossy cobblestone walls can be placed under [[note block]]s to produce "bass drum" sounds.
